Nahetu
Hetugocchaka
Sahetukaduka
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
92.
248Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
249Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (1)
